items.title: Gunmen kill nine in South Africa tavern attack
items.description: A further 10 people were injured in Bekkersdal after the perpetrators opened fire and "continued to shoot randomly".

items.title: Australian PM announces intelligence review as country mourns Bondi attack
items.description: Anthony Albanese says the country must be in a position to respond to "the rapidly changing security environment".

items.title: Imran Khan and wife given further jail terms after state gift fraud case
items.description: Pakistan's former PM, who is already serving time in prison, plans to challenge the verdict.

items.title: Survivors 'nervous and sceptical' about release of remaining Epstein files
items.description: US lawmakers who pushed for the documents to be made public have criticised the initial release as incomplete.

items.title: How Israel's grassroots hostage families group became a powerful international force
items.description: With just one hostage left in Gaza, members of the forum reflect on its influence in Israel and abroad.
